title: PM expresses grief over passing of renowned civil servant Humayun Farshori
content:
ISLAMABAD, Oct 6 (APP): Prime Minister Shehbaz Sharif on Monday expressed deep grief and sorrow over the passing of retired Pakistan Administrative Service officer Humayun Farshori.
“Humayun Farshori was a distinguished civil servant whose services will always be remembered,” the prime minister said in a statement issued by the PM Office.
He prayed for the elevation of the departed soul’s ranks in Jannah and grant of courage to the bereaved family to bear the loss with equanimity.
“Humayun Farshori’s life was an inspiring example of selfless service to the nation and all those associated with him, the prime minister said adding that he will be remembered for his exceptional integrity and intelligence.
